title: Best of The Herd for Apr 28, 2020

description:
The Cowboys draft won't matter if Dak and McCarthy don't succeed 

The Packers are much further from winning a title than people think

The Bulls documentary is showing us who the Pistons really were

Guests: John Lynch, 49ers GM

Ben Watson, former Patriots & Saints TE

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com
